item.title: reference to karin?
item.content:encoded:
The page says currently that it is a "reference of karin". As well as "the picture is of karin".
While the picture is indeed from karin, that is the only reference to it.

Karin is not Emo
Karin is not a basement dweller
Karin is immune to sunlight
The "its not so bad" when bitten might or might not reference Karin, its vague.

On the other hand, the above are clear references to a variety of other kinds of vampires. The sun thing is a pretty common theme amongst most vampire stories, the emo basement dwellers is probably a dig at "IRL Vampires"
